item.title: Single
item.description: Intro my image: otherone: {{ $image := .Resources.Get “anyname/1.png” }} Steve abc math \[ \begin{aligned} KL(\hat{y} || y) &= \sum_{c=1}^{M}\hat{y}_c \log{\frac{\hat{y}_c}{y_c}} \\ JS(\hat{y} || y) &= \frac{1}{2}(KL(y||\frac{y+\hat{y}}{2}) + KL(\hat{y}||\frac{y+\hat{y}}{2})) \end{aligned} \] This is an inline \(a^*=x-b^*\) equation. These are block equations: \[a^*=x-b^*\] \[ a^*=x-b^* \] \[ a^*=x-b^* \] These are block equations using alternate delimiters: $$a^*=x-b^*$$ $$ a^*=x-b^* $$ $$ a^*=x-b^* $$
